report.title: Live Data
report.query:
select s.id as id, l.name, s.date_start, s.date_end, ARRAY(select sa.caption || ' : ' || CASE sa.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN sav.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN t.term::text WHEN 'B' THEN CASE sav.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END ELSE sav.int_value::text END from sample_attribute_values sav INNER JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.deleted = false and sa.id = sav.sample_attribute_id LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = sav.int_value AND sa.data_type = 'L'::bpchar WHERE sav.deleted = false and sav.sample_id = s.id)::text as collection_attributes,
l.centroid_sref as sref, li.path as location_image_path, ARRAY(select la.caption || ' : ' || CASE la.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN lav.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN t.term::text WHEN 'B' THEN CASE lav.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END ELSE lav.int_value::text END from location_attribute_values lav INNER JOIN location_attributes la ON la.deleted = false and la.id = lav.location_attribute_id LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = lav.int_value AND la.data_type = 'L'::bpchar WHERE lav.deleted = false and lav.location_id = l.id)::text as location_attributes,
oi.path as flower_image_path, (CASE WHEN d.taxa_taxon_list_id IS NOT NULL THEN t1.taxon ELSE (ARRAY(select t2.taxon FROM taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 INNER JOIN taxa t2 ON ttl2.taxon_id = t2.id WHERE ttl2.id = ANY (d.taxa_taxon_list_id_list) ))::text END) as taxon, d.taxon_extra_info as flower_extra_info, ARRAY(select oa.caption || ' : ' || CASE oa.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN oav.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN t.term::text WHEN 'B' THEN CASE oav.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END ELSE oav.int_value::text END from occurrence_attribute_values oav INNER JOIN occurrence_attributes oa ON oa.deleted = false and oa.id = oav.occurrence_attribute_id LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = oav.int_value AND oa.data_type = 'L'::bpchar WHERE oav.deleted = false and oav.occurrence_id = o.id)::text as flower_attributes,
session.date_start as date, ARRAY(select sa.caption || ' : ' || CASE sa.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN sav.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN t.term::text WHEN 'B' THEN CASE sav.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END ELSE sav.int_value::text END from sample_attribute_values sav INNER JOIN sample_attributes sa ON sa.deleted = false and sa.id = sav.sample_attribute_id LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = sav.int_value AND sa.data_type = 'L'::bpchar WHERE sav.deleted = false and sav.sample_id = session.id)::text as session_attributes,
ii.path as insect_image_path, (CASE WHEN di.taxa_taxon_list_id IS NOT NULL THEN it1.taxon ELSE (ARRAY(select t2.taxon FROM taxa_taxon_lists ttl2 INNER JOIN taxa t2 ON ttl2.taxon_id = t2.id WHERE ttl2.id = ANY (di.taxa_taxon_list_id_list) ))::text END) as insect_taxon, di.taxon_extra_info as insect_extra_info, ARRAY(select oa.caption || ' : ' || CASE oa.data_type WHEN 'T' THEN oav.text_value WHEN 'L' THEN t.term::text WHEN 'B' THEN CASE oav.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'Non' ELSE 'Oui' END ELSE oav.int_value::text END from occurrence_attribute_values oav INNER JOIN occurrence_attributes oa ON oa.deleted = false and oa.id = oav.occurrence_attribute_id LEFT JOIN (termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t ON t.id = tt.term_id AND t.language_id = #language_id#) ON tt.meaning_id = oav.int_value AND oa.data_type = 'L'::bpchar WHERE oav.deleted = false and oav.occurrence_id = i.id)::text as insect_attributes
from samples s INNER JOIN locations l ON l.id = s.location_id and l.deleted = false INNER JOIN location_images li ON l.id = li.location_id and li.deleted = false INNER JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id = s.id and o.deleted = false INNER JOIN determinations d ON o.id = d.occurrence_id and d.deleted = false and d.id = (select max(d2.id) from determinations d2 where d2.occurrence_id = o.id and d2.deleted = false) INNER JOIN occurrence_images oi ON o.id = oi.occurrence_id and oi.deleted = false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl1 ON d.taxa_taxon_list_id = ttl1.id LEFT JOIN taxa t1 ON ttl1.taxon_id = t1.id INNER JOIN samples session ON session.parent_id = s.id AND session.deleted = false INNER JOIN occurrences i ON i.sample_id = session.id and i.deleted = false INNER JOIN determinations di ON i.id = di.occurrence_id and di.deleted = false and di.id = (select max(di2.id) from determinations di2 where di2.occurrence_id = i.id and di2.deleted = false) INNER JOIN occurrence_images ii ON i.id = ii.occurrence_id and ii.deleted = false LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ittl1 ON di.taxa_taxon_list_id = ittl1.id LEFT JOIN taxa it1 ON ittl1.taxon_id = it1.id WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Sélectionnez le survey pour retourner des données
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: language_id
param.description: Sélectionnez la langue pour renvoyer des données
param.query: SELECT id, language as caption FROM languages
